function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 as a highly contagious respiratory illness caused by a novel coronavirus","Impact":"Exorbitant human and economic cost, pandemic","Mitigation":"Stringent public health measures, vaccination campaigns, travel restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, air purification systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, elderly individuals","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Risk factors for fast spread of the virus, including age, gender, and smoking status","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to coronavirus infection","Mitigation":"Public health education, smoking cessation programs, targeted healthcare interventions","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, telemedicine platforms","People":"Individuals at risk based on age, gender, and smoking status","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Environmental factors contributing to the emergence and spread of epidemics, including overpopulation, biodiversity loss, and climate change","Impact":"Creation of suitable conditions for the emergence of new epidemics","Mitigation":"Sustainable urban planning, conservation efforts, climate change mitigation","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, urban design technologies, climate modeling tools","People":"General population, environmentalists, urban planners","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"}]}
